sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Veterans' Home Medical Providers' Loan Repayment Act.

sections.heading: Medical Providers Loan Repayment Program
sections.text: There is created the Medical Providers Loan Repayment Program to be administered by the Illinois Student Assistance Commission in consultation with the Department of Veterans' Affairs. The program shall provide assistance, subject to appropriation, to eligi

sections.heading: Award; maximum time period; maximum amount.
sections.text: Subject to appropriation, the Commission shall award a grant to each applicant who qualifies under this Act. An individual may receive a grant under this Act each year for up to 4 years. The amount of this grant may not exceed $5,000 per recipient per year. The Commission shall require the recipient of a grant awarded under the program to use the grant award for payment of the recipient's educational loan.

sections.heading: Application.  All applications for grant assistance under the program must be made to the Commission in a form and manner prescribed by the Commission
sections.text: Applicants shall also submit any supporting documents deemed necessary by the Commission at the time of application.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
